DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize that ongoing and more severe airway inflammation in COPD may result from the impairment in activation of innate immune response
DOC.brief_title: Innate Immune Responses in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of COPD or asthma a ratio of prebronchodilator FEV1 to forced vital capacity (FVC) equal to or less than 0.70 postbronchodilator FEV1 > or = 50% predicted Exacerbation systemic corticosteroids DM, HIV and autoimmune disease immunosuppressive therapy
